sense.name: A journey in a vehicle, usually an automobile.
sense.examples: He took the family for a ride in his new car. He took the Motorcycle for a test ride before buying it. Howzabout a ride downtown in a police car, you little thief?!

sense.name: A mechanical device or amusement that you ride for excitement.
sense.examples: My family pooled their money to buy me a ride in an acrobatic plane for my birthday. We took a ride on The Cyclone and it shook us so hard we nearly puked. Take a ride on The Water Luge, Germany's premier water-coaster.
